creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: four palanquin carriers laboring under the weight of a sumo wrestler as they carry him down a river; a second wrestler rides on top of a horse led by an attendant at rear; large rock formation at L; bay with boats and shoreline in middle and background
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; URQ
title: Okitsu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
